00045 /*****************************************************************************/
00046 /**
00047  * translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack
00048  * Synopsis:
00049  *
00050  *  There is a catch 22 where the command line message handlers need to
00051  * have the PGOptions information in order to set up the message handling
00052  * log file name, etc. Resolve this by passing in a call back to the
00053  * TranslateEngine constructor which initializes the PGOptions.
00054  *
00055  * @param atdOopts - filled in with all the PGOptions data.
00056  *
00057  * @return - nada, initializes message handling.
00058  */
00059 /*****************************************************************************/
00060 static void translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack(ADTOptions & adtOpts)
00061 {
00062 
00063   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00064 
00065   Fs::mkdirPath(adtOpts.m_outputDir, false);
00066 
00067   string verboseLogName = Fs::join(adtOpts.m_outputDir,adtOpts.m_progName + ".log");
00068 
00069   std::ofstream *verboseOFStream = new std::ofstream;
00070 
00071   Fs::mustOpenToWrite(*(verboseOFStream), verboseLogName.c_str());
00072 
00073   ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM logVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION;
00074   if (adtOpts.m_verbosity > ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION) {
00075     logVerbosity = (ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM) adtOpts.m_verbosity;
00076   }
00077 
00078   LogStream *verboseLogStream = new
00079   LogStream(logVerbosity,  verboseOFStream);
00080 
00081   Verbose::pushMsgHandler(verboseLogStream);
00082   Verbose::pushProgressHandler(verboseLogStream);
00083   Verbose::pushWarnHandler(verboseLogStream);
00084   Verbose::setLevel(adtOpts.m_verbosity);
00085 
00086   return;
00087 }
00088 // end translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack
00089 /*****************************************************************************/
00090 /*****************************************************************************/
00091 /**
00092  * @class CopyNumberTableTest
00093  * @brief cppunit class for testing CallSet behavior
00094  */
00095 /*****************************************************************************/
00096 class ConsoleInitializationTest : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00097 {
00098 
00099 private:
00100 
00101   map<string, string>        m_oneToOneOptions;
00102   vector< vector< string > > m_sampleTable;
00103   vector< string >           m_experimentListVector;
00104 
00105   RunTimeEnvironment rte;
00106 
00107   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(ConsoleInitializationTest);
00108   CPPUNIT_TEST(setUp);
00109   CPPUNIT_TEST(run);
00110   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00111 
00112 public:
00113   void setUp();
00114   void run();
00115 };
00116 // end ConsoleInitializationTest

00119 /**
00120  * Initialization method called before each test routine.
00121  *
00122  */
00123 /*****************************************************************************/
00124 void ConsoleInitializationTest::setUp()
00125 {
00126 
00127   cerr << endl;
00128 
00129   m_oneToOneOptions["out-dir"] = "output";
00130   m_oneToOneOptions["translate-file"]  = TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "DMET_Plus.r3.20081008.dc_translation.txt";
00131   m_oneToOneOptions["annotation-file"] =   TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "DMET_Plus.r3.20081008.dc_annot.csv";
00132   m_experimentListVector.push_back(TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "NA11832__HAPMAP_01A_0807_WC_Pilot2_37.dmet.chp");
00133 
00134   vector < string > row;
00135 
00136   row.push_back("Experiment Id");
00137   row.push_back("Sample Type");
00138   row.push_back("Consented Marker List");
00139   row.push_back("Research Code");
00140   row.push_back("Facility Code");
00141   row.push_back("Study Code");
00142   row.push_back("Investigator");
00143   row.push_back("Patient Number");
00144 
00145   m_sampleTable.push_back(row);
00146   row.clear();
00147 
00148   row.push_back("f1b8c758-cadf-4744-b5b3-10e82dcd110d");
00149   row.push_back("sample");
00150   row.push_back("DMETPlus_All");
00151   row.push_back("ACSL");
00152   row.push_back("");
00153   row.push_back("");
00154   row.push_back("J.Lo");
00155   row.push_back("10-019");
00156 
00157   m_sampleTable.push_back(row);
00158 
00159 
00160   return;
00161 }
00162 // end ConsoleInitializationTest::setUp
00163 /*****************************************************************************/
00164 /*****************************************************************************/
00165 /**
00166  * ConsoleInitializationTest::run
00167  *
00168  */
00169 /*****************************************************************************/
00170 void ConsoleInitializationTest::run()
00171 {
00172 
00173   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("ConsoleInitializationTest", "run");
00174 
00175   map<string, string>::iterator itSS;
00176 
00177   TranslationEngine te(NULL, C_CMDLINE | C_CONSOLE, &translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack);
00178 
00179 
00180   for (itSS  = m_oneToOneOptions.begin();
00181        itSS != m_oneToOneOptions.end();
00182        itSS++) {
00183 
00184     te.setOpt(itSS->first, itSS->second);
00185   }
00186 
00187   te.setOpt("experiment-list-vector", m_experimentListVector);
00188   te.setOpt("sample-table", m_sampleTable);
00189 
00190   te.run();
00191 
00192 }
00193 // end ConsoleInitializationTest::run
